entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in Forillon Park. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm in Forillon Park. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
